about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi, my name is Dahlia, and I'm 21 years old. In my third year of Computer Science, I've developed a genuine interest in IT Support and Software Development. I'm always eager to expand my toolkit, I thrive on the energy and creativity that come from teamwork and working together to solve problems. With a positive attitude and always ready for a challenge, I'm eager to work on amazing applications and projects.
about.education: Computer Science Technology. Champlain College, Saint-Lambert

experience1.responsibility1: Defined and developed scripts and interfaces for enhancing employee workflow within the Applications team at OPAL-RT.
experience1.responsibility2: Developed and optimized Power Automate flows to enhance process automation and efficiency.
experience1.responsibility3: Contributed to IT infrastructure projects and team scrums.

experience2.responsibility1: Performed warehouse duties, including inventory management, order fulfillment, and collaboration with team members.
experience2.responsibility2: Operated specialized warehouse equipment, contributing to the seamless execution of operations.
experience2.responsibility3: Upheld safety standards and workplace security.

experience3.responsibility1: Provided outstanding customer service with a friendly approach.
experience3.responsibility2: Efficiently managed transactions and addressed inquiries.
experience3.responsibility3: Briefly supervised a grocery store team, ensuring smooth operations.

experience4.responsibility1: Handled cash and credit card transactions with accuracy and speed, maintaining a balanced cash drawer.
experience4.responsibility2: Collaborated with team members to maintain a clean and organized store environment.
experience4.responsibility3: Enhanced guest satisfaction by resolving complaints.

cooking.title: Cooking
cooking.description: I got into cooking a while back, experimenting with different ingredients. It's my go-to activity for relaxation and creativity, especially with various cuisines.

swimming.title: Swimming
swimming.description: I've been swimming since childhood, and recently, I've started teaching a friend. It's a straightforward and effective way to stay in shape and spend quality time.

languages.title: Learning Languages
languages.description: Fascinated by languages, I've taken up Spanish and Hindi. Diving into these languages allows me to appreciate different cultures and ways of thinking.

photography.title: Photography
photography.description: I've delved into photography, capturing moments and views that speak to me. From nature shots to urban landscapes, it allows me to preserve memories uniquely.

emailSection.title: Let's Connect
emailSection.description: I'm open to connections! Send me a message, and I'll get back to you as soon as I can.
emailSection.subject: Subject

banner.name: Dahlia James
banner.quote: The sky's not the limit, it's the beginning.

project1.title: Rabia Patel Art Website
project1.description: An online e-commerce platform for artist Rabia Patel, featuring user accounts, artwork purchases, and options for commissioning or contacting the artist.

project2.title: HTML, CSS Portfolio Website with Huma
project2.description: A collaborative portfolio project from a User Interface Design Class at Champlain College, showcasing web design skills.

project3.title: The Fresh Tables
project3.description: An online restaurant service that offers a customizable menu and meal planning, tailored to user preferences.

project4.title: Hindi Go App
project4.description: A user-friendly app designed to facilitate learning conversational Hindi through interactive methods like journaling, audio lessons, flashcards, and quizzes.

project5.title: Virtual Art Gallery
project5.description: A virtual art gallery developed by a team using the ASP.NET framework, showcasing various artworks digitally.

project6.title: Library Management System
project6.description: An online library management system designed for efficient handling of library operations and user management.

project7.title: Chatroom Site
project7.description: A PHP-based chatroom site created as a group project, featuring user authentication and interactive chat capabilities.

project8.title: Adventurelytical Game
project8.description: A 2D platformer coin rush game developed in Unity by a team of four, combining adventure and analytical challenges.
